name: MNSTR
description:
Created in 2010, MNSTR is an agency from the digital era. Its profession: storytelling, rolled out through the creation of brand content, engagement campaigns on networks and integrated campaigns. This storytelling focused on digital spreads towards advertising, PR or events. Stories are devised in collaboration with the most highly specialized creative talents: directors, writers, and graphic designers.
Accompanying brands in the elaboration of engaging today that their business thrive tomorrow.
